Splendor¶

Splendor is an OpenAPI compatible Python web API framework built on top of Flask.

We focus on Collections as a primary construct, tying together data, permissions, and business logic in an elegant way that can be immediately imported into tools like Swagger.

We emphasize Organic Development of APIs by scaffolding the process from quick iteration to solid, well tested, documented, and importantly, maintainable versions.

Reference¶

class splendor.schema.fields.Schematic(__schematic_config__=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Construct that carries a schema (__schema__) and enforces its properties to follow it.

get_schema_value(ignore_default=False, ignore_empty=True, export=False)[source]¶

Combines the schema-property values of this object with the inherited ones, and returns it as a dict.

If ignore_default is True (default) properties with default values won’t be included.
